rule: The output must first focus on the timing and lighting of the photo.
input: A modern house in the evening with sunset views.
output: Capture a sleek, contemporary house bathed in the warm glow of a setting sun.  Windows shimmer as golden light spills across its minimalist facade, casting long shadows that stretch towards a vibrant orange and purple horizon. Let the fading daylight paint the scene in hues of tranquility and serenity. The air is thick with a sense of peacefulness, promising an evening filled with quiet contemplation.
complianceText:
The evaluation of the chatbot output involves checking several criteria as per the description. The output is concise and contains a single paragraph with a focus on the subject (a sleek, contemporary house) and its characteristics (bathed in warm glow, windows shimmering), timing and lighting (setting sun, golden light), and the background (vibrant orange and purple horizon). The output also conveys a feeling the image should evoke (tranquility, serenity, peacefulness, quiet contemplation). There is no indication that the description exceeds 80 words, ensuring compliance with the word limit. The text is written in English and uses artistic insight and precise imagery to create an impactful description. All elements required by the description appear to be met. 

OK
